summary: Adds 40 Game of Thrones companions to the game, including 24 craftable unique armor sets.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/XvdyY.jpg[/img]

This project is a continual work in progress, adding more companions and original armor pieces based on HBO\'s Game of Thrones.

[size=4][b]Latest Update[/b][/size]
[size=3]Version 3.06 Hotfix Changelog:[/size]
[list]
[*]Fixed invisible legs on Sellsword armor
[*]Fixed Loras\'s outfit assignment
[*]Fixed invisible armors
[*]Added temperable recipes
[*]Fixed Dothraki Arakh with new texture
[/list]
[size=3]Version 3.0 Changelog:[/size]
[list]
[*]Changed gloves & boots to two generic kinds: Heavy Leather, Light Leather; leather craft
[*]Added Longclaw (Jon), Oathkeeper (Brienne) by TheDahaka
[*]Added Arakh (Drogo) by Kronaras
[*]Added Traveler\'s Disguise (female: Arya, male: Gendry); leather craft
[*]Added Tarth Gauntlets (Brienne); steel craft
[*]Added Sell Sword\'s Jerkin (Bronn); leather craft
[*]Added Hound\'s Cuirass; steel craft
[*]Added Night\'s Watch Steward Jerkin (Jon); leather craft
[*]Added Exiled Northern Cuirass (Jorah); steel craft
[*]Added Stark Captain Armor (Jory); studded craft
[*]Added King\'s Guard Cuirass (Selmy); steel craft
[*]Added King\'s Guard Cape (Selmy) by Nikinoodles; leather craft
[*]Added Knight of Flowers Cuirass (Loras); steel craft
[*]Added Knight of Flowers Gauntlets (Loras); steel craft
[*]Added King Renly\'s Armor (Renly); steel craft
[*]Added King Stannis\'s Armor (Stannis); steel craft
[*]Updated version of Stark Standard Armor (Eddard); studded craft
[*]Added Baratheon Cuirass of Storm\'s End; steel craft
[*]Added Baratheon Helm of Storm\'s End; steel craft
[*]Added Baratheon Cuirass of Dragon\'s Reach; steel craft
[*]Added Baratheon Helm of Dragon\'s Reach; steel craft
[*]Added Lannister Jerkin (Tyrion); leather craft
[*]Added Night\'s Watch Veteran Jerkin (Yoren); leather craft


[/list]

[size=4][b]Unique Craftable Armor[/size]:[/b]
[url=http://home.comcast.net/~bilwit/uniqueHIGH.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/8qrhm.jpg[/img][/url]
[size=1](click to enlarge)[/size]

[list]
[*]Lannister Standard (male)
[*]Lannister Standard (female)
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/107187]Lannister Officer[/url]
[*]The Mountain*
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/107555]Stark Heavy[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/113107]Stormlands Kingsguard[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/116385]Sandor \"The Hound\" Clegane[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/115470]King Renly\'s Armor[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/114965]Gendry\'s Jerkin[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/117126]Ironborn (female)[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/116849]Ironborn (male)[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/115239]Jorah Mormont (Armored)[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/116274]King\'s Guard[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/117273]Night\'s Watch (Jon)[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/114009]Night\'s Watch (Yoren)[/url] 
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/114139]Sell Sword (Bronn)[/url] 
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/114956]Arya\'s Outfit[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/114338]Stark Light[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/113912]Stark Medium[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/114969]Tyrion Lannister\'s Jerkin[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/117779]Baratheon Guard of Storm\'s End[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/118240]King Stannis\'s Armor[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/118685]Baratheon Guard of Dragon\'s Reach[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/119319]Knight of Flowers[/url]
[/list]
[size=1]*Models/Textures made by Omegared99, the rest by Bilwit[/size]

[size=4][b]Follower Locations:[/b][/size]
[size=1][color=red](wears unique outfit based on HBO counterpart in Version 3.0)[/color][/size]
[list]
[*][color=red]Renly Baratheon - Deadman\'s Drink Inn, Falkreath[/color]
[*]Robert Baratheon - Palace of Kings, Windhelm
[*][color=red]Stannis Baratheon - Solitude Docks (on a ship)[/color]
[*][color=red]Bronn - Sleeping Giant Inn, Riverwood[/color]
[*][color=red]Jory Cassel - Place of the Kings, Windhelm[/color]
[*][color=red]Ser Gregor Clegane (The Mountain) - Winking Skeever Inn, Solitude[/color]
[*][color=red]Sandor Clegane (The Hound) - Winking Skeever Inn, Solitude[/color]
[*]Khal Drogo - Frostfruit Inn, Rorikstead
[*]Ser Vardis Egen - The Nightgate Inn, Windhelm
[*]Syrio Forel - Jorrvaskr, Whiterun
[*][color=red]Gendry - Smithy, Dawnstar[/color]
[*][color=red]Theon Greyjoy - Silverblood Inn, Markarth[/color]
[*][color=red]Yara Greyjoy - SilverBlood Inn, Markarth[/color]
[*][color=red]Jaqen H\'ghar - Solitude Docks[/color]
[*]Hodor - Moorside Inn, Morthal
[*][color=red]Jaime Lannister (The Kingslayer) - Winking Skeever Inn, Solitude[/color]
[*][color=red]Tyrion Lannister (The Imp) - The Sleeping Giant Inn, Riverwood[/color]
[*][color=red]Tywin Lannister - Blue Palace, Solitude[/color]
[*]Melisandre - Frozen Hearth Inn, Winterhold
[*]Jeor Mormont - Jorrvaskr, Whiterun
[*][color=red]Jorah Mormont - Dushnikh Yal[/color]
[*]Ser Ilyn Payne - Blue Palace, Solitude
[*]Davos Seaworth - Solitude Docks (on a ship)
[*][color=red]Ser Barristan Selmy - Four Shields Inn, Dragon Bridge[/color]
[*][color=red]Jon Snow - Jorrvaskr, Whiterun[/color]
[*][color=red]Ayra Stark - The Bee and Barb Inn, Riften[/color]
[*]Benjen Stark - Jorrvaskr, Whiterun
[*][color=red]Eddard Stark - Can be found at the Place of the Kings as well.[/color]
[*][color=red]Robb Stark - The Palace of the Kings, Windhelm[/color]
[*]Sansa Stark - Blue Palace, Solitude
[*]Aegon Targaryen - Mooreside Inn, Morthal
[*]Daenerys Targaryen - Dushnikh Yal
[*]Viserys Targaryen - Windpeak Inn, DawnStar
[*][color=red]Brienne of Tarth - The Bannered Mare, Whiterun[/color]
[*][color=red]Loras Tyrell - Deadman\'s Drink Inn, Falkreath[/color]
[*]Margaery Tyrell - Deadman\'s Drink Inn, Falkreath
[*]Ygritte - Candlehearth Hall, Windhelm
[*][color=red]Yoren - Jorrvaskr, Whiterun[/color]
[/list]

[size=4][b](Optional) Direwolves[/b][/size] by SpiralDynasty:
([size=1]For troubleshooting, refer to the original author\'s page [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=75553020]here[/url][/size])
[list]
[*]Ghost- Dawnstar, he is outside of the upper-most house (Irgnirs next to the iron mine)
[*]Grey Wind - Khajiit caravan area, Whiterun
[*]Lady - Solitude Mill by lone pinetree 
[*]Nymeria - Outside of Riften Honeyside Home, along the beach of the lake
[*]Shaggy Dog - Brandy Mug farm outside of Windhelm
[*]Summer - Outside of Markarth, on the farm next to the silo
[/list]

[size=4][b]Installation: [/b][/size]
[list]
[*](Manual) Place Data folder in the Skyrim Folder in (Program Files(x86)/Steam/Steam apps/common/SKYRIM)
[*](Regular) Download and install through NMM
[/list]

[size=4][b]Recommended Mods: [/b][/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092]Cloaks of Skyrim by Nikinoodles[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17250]Regent\'s Armory by blackstept[/url] 
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045]My Home Is Your Home - A Mod for Followers by Volek[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4860]No More Dangling Swords by Abakus[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19661]Winterfell ENB by youngneil1[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13486]Winter is Coming Cloaks by Nivea[/url]
[/list]

[size=4][b]Credits: [/b][/size]
[list]
[*]Bilwit - Texture Wizard
[*]TheDahaka - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15781]MOIAF - Mods Of Ice And Fire[/url]
[*]Koechophe - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19253]Dwarf Race[/url]
[*]Kronaras - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20985]Arakh Blade - Game of Thrones[/url]
[*]L0rdofWar - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5588]Witcher 2 Models[/url] 
[*]Marinetastic - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14751]Game of Thrones mini-pack[/url]
[*]M0ckin9bird - Moving some sliders that [url=http://i.imgur.com/tDmT3.jpg]may or may not[/url] have been included in this mod 
[*]Nikinoodles - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url]
[*]OmegaRed99 - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10277]Omegared99\'s Armor compilation[/url]
[*]SpiralDynasty - [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=75553020]Game of Thrones Dire Wolves[/url]
[*]Th3Wick3d1 - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7807]Witcher 2 - Viper Assassin-Blue Stripes-Roche-Ves[/url]
[/list]

[size=4][b]Permissions, On Using Models/Textures In Your Mod:[/b][/size]
All models and textures edited/altered/created by bilwit are open source. Be courteous and give credit where credit is due.

[size=4][b]Feedback/Suggestions: [/b][/size]
Leave any feedback or suggestions in the comments section.
author: Donker316
